pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.26: “Support” renders _nissaya_. See Appendix of Technical Terms for discussion.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.16: “Outside the gateway” renders _bahidvārakoṭṭhaka_ (in the previous sentence). See Appendix of Technical Terms for a discussion of the word _koṭṭhaka_.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.1: “Sitting (blanket)” renders _nisīdana_. See Appendix of Technical Terms for discussion.
